ing: 1 1/3 cups hot freshly brewed dark roast espresso coffee
des: "This is for all fellow coffee drinkers. I love lattes but buying them can be pricey. So here's a recipe so you can make your own."
ins: Heat milk in a saucepan set over medium-low heat. Whisk briskly with a wire whisk to create foam. Brew espresso and pour into 4 cups. Pour in milk, holding back the foam with a spoon. Spoon foam over the top.
